Line13.ACEF6: All I have done is offer you help, and yet you repay me with Hatred. Why not focus that anger on Lilith for the time being?
Line15.ACEF6: Take my blessing. Destroy her. Save your world.
Line17.ACEF6: Well done. You were born for this.
Line5.ACEF6: Yes, I have had some bad luck in recent years. Trapped in those soulstone trinkets. Cast back to Hell.
Line7.BAE4: I didn’t expect a Prime Evil would need a mortal’s help.
Line9.ACEF6: My essence is reforming, and so my power has limits. We all have our ups and downs, don’t we?
